Main responsibilities :
1st /2nd and 3rd line support for technical and coordinating issues with Active Directory.
Maintaining Maintel VoIP system and responding for daily user Issues.
Cable patching. Cabinet arrangement and switch installation
Maintaining HP L2/L3 switch layers and xirrus Wifi System in the College. 
Scheduling, Monitoring the Weekly Backups of college Data.
Monitoring, Updating the college Network switches,routers and Servers with Nagios Open system Application and HP Procurve Network Monitoring tool. 
Monitoring, Updating Potential Attacks with Snort Server.

Worked as a Network Executive at John Keells Group in their Voice IP project which is largest VoIP project in Sri Lanka with more than 1500 IP phones.  It’s has been implemented by Sri Lanka Telecom as an Opex model.  System was implemented using Cisco3800, 7200, 1800 Gateway routers, 6500, 4500, 3750, 3560 Switches, Unified Communication Manager servers, IP Communicator, Cisco Unified Operations Manager, Unity Sever.

1st /2nd and 3rd line support for technical and coordinating issues which involve customer support in person and remote( Network issues, PC issues,System support issues and Telephone issues) . When customer inquiry logs in the system, I had been asked to fix the customer issues.
Coordinating, guiding and being a part of the System Integrator implementation on network infrastructure preparation (cabling, Switch and router installation, upgrading switches and configurations). The infrastructure layout completely changed and upgraded according to the standards. I have consulted the team and involved in all the activities in physical. 
Consulting, Configuring and coordinating on server installations. Cisco Call Manager, Unity server, IPCC server.  Cisco Uniform Operation Management server, Link Management Server. The implementation had been carried out by Cisco services and we were given the chance to learn the configure and test the running system. 
Assisting project managers with coordinating, monitoring, design, implementing and testing the project activities. I hold the responsibilities when and where I had to put my instinct in critical events with guidance of Project Manager in some phases of the project.  

preparing project monthly status reports, meeting minutes and gathered user inputs in order to achieve system requirements, also working out with Call processing flow chart, Change manage documents and  Data ,Voice network design plan.
Also responsible for John Keells internal operational network in their Day to day activities.

jobs.description:
Manage wide range of projects in the digital transformation space spanning from machine learning projects to e-commerce integration projects. 

Manage and lead the project team while coordinating the partners and working-groups engaged in project work.

Work closely with users to ensure the project outcome meets business needs

Recruit or assign internal/external members into the project

Develop and maintain detailed project plans while managing the deliverables in line with it

Resolve cross-functional issues at project level. Record and manage project issues, project scope and change control and escalate issues where necessary

Monitor project progress and performance and provide status reports to the project sponsor while providing regular status reports to the Lead Project Manager

Liaise with, and update progress to, project board/senior management of the particular Business Unit

Manage project evaluation and dissemination activities

Manage project training and consultancy input within the defined budget wherever applicable

Establish final approval of the design specification

Define and manage the User Acceptance Testing programme

Identify user training needs and devise and manage user training programmes

Perform any other duties and responsibilities assigned by the management commensurate with the current role

Establish web project scope by studying strategic business drivers; discovering and validating business and technical requirements and parameters; obtaining input from subject-matter experts; examining and recommending changes to current business practices; developing and writing proposals.

Operate as a point person and lead multiple concurrent website build projects, managing communications, scope, and timeline.

Provide input regarding creative design and user experience recommendations as they align to client’s requirements, project, and organizational goals.

Evaluate and take responsibility of the quality of project deliverables before delivery to the client for sign-off. Milestones are to be met as promised at the approval stage.

Accomplish work requirements by orienting, training, assigning, scheduling, coaching employees; following production, productivity, quality, and customer-service standards, and identifying work process improvements. Time tracking of staff is a must.

Maintain general quality assurance guidelines in aspects such as front-end web design, technical SEO, cross-browser and cross-device responsivity, page optimization through vigorous QA.  

Act as a subject matter expert for questions pertaining to front-end web design technologies – HTML, CSS, JavaScript, server-side architecture, etc.

Accomplish organization goals by accepting ownership for accomplishing new and different requests; exploring opportunities to add value to job accomplishments

Responsible for the creation and implementation of marketing strategies.
      

    
      

    Business development and lead generation.

general.fullName: Charles De Silva - BSc(Hons)IS, MCP, MCAD, CSM
general.headline:
Business Analyst Manager / Head Of Support Services at Unicorn Solutions (Pvt.) Ltd /
President of Alumni at MMU UK
general.description:
-Bachelor’s Degree in Information Systems, Microsoft Certified Professional / Application Developer, Certified Scrum Master, with over 15+ years of industry experience working in USA, Europe and in Asia
-Worked as a Business Analyst and Project Manager across diverse industries and across organizations in the Telecommunication, Banking, Finance, Educational, Digital and Utilities sectors
-Strong stakeholder management skills having managed diverse Subject Matter Experts (SME’s) and Middle to Senior Management in-order to identify and document business processes, system requirements and to initiate and implement the process of change
-Demonstrated experience across the full software life-cycle from project initiation to requirements elicitation, analysis and design, to User Acceptance Testing (UAT) to end user training
-Demonstrated experience in the agile and waterfall project management methodologies
-Demonstrated experience in process development and documentation development of AS IS and TO BE processes and the associated procedures and work instructions
-Demonstrated experience in the end-to-end management of business requirements including requirements capture, documentation, stakeholder acceptance, tracking across all phases and impact assessments to understand the impact of changes
-Demonstrated experience in the competencies tools and techniques of Business Analysis including data analysis, financial modelling, cost benefit analysis, root cause analysis and decision analysis
